item.description:
For directions, click here

 

   Join us outside on the Wharf by the Big HOOD Milk Bottle for an evening of ZYDECO with The Sueezebox Stompers on Children's Museum Wharf from 6 - 9PM. Beer & Wine will be for sale.

 

The Squeezebox Stompers play a unique brand of Roadhouse Roots music: Cajun, Zydeco, blues, country, and originals- music heard at a Southern roadhouse or in a walk down Bourbon Street. They perform at coffeehouses, festivals, and private functions throughout the Northeast.
item.how_to_find_us: On the Wharf in front of the Children's Museum
item.name: FREE ZYDECO CONCERT
